Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons

Interface TargetFinder

  • public interface TargetFinder
    This interface contains a set of methods used to find targets for an action

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> adaptToScope​(java.util.Set<Player> potentialTargets)
      Adapts the potential targets to the actual scope of the weapon
      java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> addToEach​(java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> potentialTargets, Weapon weapon)
      Adds targets to each group of targets, based on the status of the weapon
      java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> applyVeto​(java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> potentialTargets, Weapon weapon)
      Removes targets that cannot be attacked based on the status of the weapon
      java.util.Set<Player> getBonusTargets​(java.util.List<Player> previouslyHit, Player activePlayer)
      Finds the bonus targets - those targets that the weapon will hit no matter where they are on the board
      java.util.Optional<TargetCalculator> getCalculator()
      Gets the TargetCalculator that is used
      java.util.Set<Player> getTargetsToChooseFrom​(Weapon currentWeapon)
      Limits the targets available to this weapon

    • Method Detail

      • getCalculator

        java.util.Optional<TargetCalculator> getCalculator()
        Gets the TargetCalculator that is used
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the target calculator if present, or Optional.empty() if it is not

      • getBonusTargets

        java.util.Set<Player> getBonusTargets​(java.util.List<Player> previouslyHit,
                                      Player activePlayer)
        Finds the bonus targets - those targets that the weapon will hit no matter where they are on the board
        Parameters:
        previouslyHit - the targets previously hit by the weapon
        activePlayer - the current shooter of the weapon
        Returns:
        a set with the new targets

      • getTargetsToChooseFrom

        java.util.Set<Player> getTargetsToChooseFrom​(Weapon currentWeapon)
        Limits the targets available to this weapon
        Parameters:
        currentWeapon - the Weapon that is used to shoot
        Returns:
        the set of targets that are potentially available, based on their status

      • adaptToScope

        java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> adaptToScope​(java.util.Set<Player> potentialTargets)
        Adapts the potential targets to the actual scope of the weapon
        Parameters:
        potentialTargets - the potential targets of this weapon
        Returns:
        a set of groups of targets, adapted to the field of action of the weapon

      • addToEach

        java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> addToEach​(java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> potentialTargets,
                                               Weapon weapon)
        Adds targets to each group of targets, based on the status of the weapon
        Parameters:
        potentialTargets - the pre-computed potential groups of targets
        weapon - the Weapon used to shoot
        Returns:
        the updated potential groups of targets

      • applyVeto

        java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> applyVeto​(java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> potentialTargets,
                                               Weapon weapon)
        Removes targets that cannot be attacked based on the status of the weapon
        Parameters:
        potentialTargets - the pre-computed potential groups of targets
        weapon - the Weapon used to shoot
        Returns:
        the updated potential groups of targets
